channel.title: Noclip is 50%?
channel.description: ok guys so im gonna cut to the chase ive followed this tut: http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/224636-clipping-npcs-fix.html and i love the results but it only seems to wok sometime like if the npc is agressive it noclips through stuff and then if i attack a non agressive it will also noclip through stuff and even if i restart the server it won't fix and its like its moody or something it only seems to work on some npcs(non agressive ones) and if i attack a non agressive one after i have battled an agressive one the non agressive one will also noclip any help ideas heres my walkinghandler.java
